{"id":1267634306,"question_id":3420,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1716651189,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"44 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1267634306/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Occurrences of an Element in an Array","memory":"65.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] occurrencesOfElement(int[] nums, int[] queries, int x) {\n        \n        \n        int len = queries.length;\n        \n        Map<Integer, List<Integer>> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<nums.length; i++){\n            map.putIfAbsent(nums[i], new ArrayList<>());\n            map.get(nums[i]).add(i);\n        }\n        \n        int[] res = new int[len];\n        \n        \n        for(int i=0; i<queries.length; i++){\n            \n            int q = queries[i];\n            \n            if(map.getOrDefault(x, new ArrayList<>()).size()<q)\n                res[i] = -1;\n            else\n                res[i] = map.get(x).get(q-1);\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-occurrences-of-an-element-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
